00095 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetRounded(const double& value) const
00096 {
00097        return GetNormalValue(GetInternalValue(value));
00098 }
00099 
00100 
00101 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsEqual(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00102 {
00103        return GetInternalValue(value1) == GetInternalValue(value2);
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsSmaller(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00108 {
00109        return GetInternalValue(value1) < GetInternalValue(value2);
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 inline bool CFixedPointManip::IsSmallerEqual(const double& value1, const double& value2) const
00114 {
00115        return GetInternalValue(value1) <= GetInternalValue(value2);
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetSmallerValue(const double& value) const
00120 {
00121        return GetNormalValue(GetInternalValue(value) - 1);
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetBiggerValue(const double& value) const
00126 {
00127        return GetNormalValue(GetInternalValue(value) + 1);
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 // protected methods
00132 
00133 inline I_SDWORD CFixedPointManip::GetInternalValue(double value) const
00134 {
00135        RoundingFuntionPtr function = m_roundingFuntionsPtr[m_roundingType];
00136 
00137        return I_SDWORD(function(value * m_scaleToIntFactor + 0.5));
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 inline double CFixedPointManip::GetNormalValue(I_SDWORD intValue) const
00142 {
00143        return intValue / m_scaleToIntFactor;
00144 }
